summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3572 , for the improvement of the alley in block 2, University Heights Addition, being the alley between University Way, and 15th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street, by paving, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44691 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
